articles.title: How the pandemic helped cricketer Ashleigh Gardner build a deeper connection with her Indigenous identity
articles.description: For Ashleigh Gardner, spending more time at home in Australia during the pandemic meant she could reconnect with her Indigenous roots.
articles.content:
The Australian women's cricket team has not left the country since the pandemic struck in March 2020.

articles.title: Moeen 'not surprised' by racism scandal
articles.description: England's Moeen Ali says he is not surprised by the Yorkshire County Cricket Club racism scandal and there are "probably more stories out there", but believes "it will bring changes" to the sport.
articles.content:
Moeen Ali has played in 64 Tests, 112 one-day-internationals and 43 Twenty20s for England
